This year, Alex approached the club advisor, Ms. Thompson, expressing concerns about Jamie's behavior. Alex mentioned that Jamie had been spreading rumors and making derogatory comments about other students, which had created a toxic environment. Initially, Alex considered leaving the club, but Ms. Thompson assured Alex that she would address the issue and asked Alex to stay involved.
